page.title: 07Day In The Life Of Farm Girl
page.content: In the morning I get up at six o'clock.I eat my cornflakes then help mum and dad feed the lambs and calves.I go down the road at 8.10 am.and I wait for the school taxi which arrives at 8.25 am.When we get to school we usually do maths and project work.School dinners are good and at break-times we normally play marbles,hightig or hopscotch.At 3.30 pm.the taxi takes me home and I change into my jeans before I go out to play.Some days I go out riding.At six o'clock I have my tea and at nine I go to bed.When in bed,I often play my tapes or try to pick up signals on my radio but I become bored and fall asleep.
